thread.title: CEO's departure pushes WPP into uncharted waters

title: CEO's departure pushes WPP into uncharted waters
text:
CEO's departure pushes WPP into uncharted waters 9:39pm IST - 01:58 
WPP shares slid as investors digest the sudden departure of its founder, legendary ad man Martin Sorrell. He leaves, following an investigation into alleged misconduct, at a time of sweeping change in the advertising industry. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
WPP shares slid as investors digest the sudden departure of its founder, legendary ad man Martin Sorrell. He leaves, following an investigation into alleged misconduct, at a time of sweeping change in the advertising industry.
